sentences.en: "Doctor McKee?" the man called in an even, sonorous voice.
sentences.cn: “是麦基博士吗？”那个男人用平稳而洪亮的声音喊道。

sentences.en: Cantabile youth, as well as and flow, sometimes low, sometimes sonorous.
sentences.cn: 青春如歌, 亦如随波而流, 时而低沉, 时而高亢.

sentences.en: He has a deep sonorous voice.
He was chosen as a broadcaster for his round and sonorous voice.
sentences.cn: 他因为嗓音圆润洪亮而被选为播音员.

sentences.en: He was continually giving vent to a hearty , sonorous, unshared laugh.
sentences.cn: 他还时常发出一阵愉快 、 响亮 、 干脆的笑声.

sentences.en: His firm, sonorous, and unexpected voice made every one start.
sentences.cn: 他这坚决, 响亮和出人意外的声音使人人都吃了一惊.

sentences.en: In a hush, its sound appears all the more sonorous and strong.
sentences.cn: 在一片寂静之中, 它的声音显得格外的高亢有力.

sentences.en: Luther's Protestantism is a grand theology, a sonorous earnest hardheaded Christianity.
sentences.cn: 路瑟的新教是一种宏伟的神学, 一种恳切响亮、讲求实际的基督教.

sentences.en: Mr. Kenge spoke in a sonorous voice.
sentences.cn: 肯吉先生用一种抑扬顿挫的声调谈论着.

sentences.en: Northern opera is defined by very loud and sonorous singing.
sentences.cn: 北方的梆子腔高亢嘹亮.

sentences.en: The sonorous voice of the priest resounded in the church.
sentences.cn: 教士那圆润低沉的声音在教堂里回响.

sentences.en: The sonorous voice of the speaker echoed round the hall.
sentences.cn: 演说者洪亮的声音在大厅内回荡.

sentences.en: Then came Yo-Yo Ma ’76, swaying and ecstatic, playing sonorous Bach on his cello. Afterward, President Drew Faust joined him on the tented stage in front of the Memorial Church.
sentences.cn: 音乐节目开始了,在一个更加古典的片断前,这片断是由哈佛拉德克利夫管弦乐队演奏的,具有天堂般旋律的声音从霍尔登唱诗班传来.这样,传来了喑喑的玛-76的声音,入迷地摇摆着,从他的大提琴上传来响亮的的声音.之后,德鲁浮士德校长加入了设在纪念教堂前的帐篷舞台.蛋糕在哪儿?

sentences.en: These much - quoted words can apply also to the sonorous prose of Bartram.
sentences.cn: 这些时常被人引用的话也可以拿来形容巴特铿锵有声的散文.

sentences.en: This poem is both majestic and sonorous.
sentences.cn: 这首诗读起来音调铿锵.

sentences.en: While talking , the professor sounds very sonorous , and forcful.
sentences.cn: 教授讲话时, 总是掷地有声.

words.tran_cn: 响亮的；作响的；能发出响亮声音的

trans.tran_cn: 圆润低沉的，响亮的，洪亮的，（尤指语言、文字等）感人的
trans.tran_en: having a pleasantly deep loud sound
